result.html: Las a súileHer eyes lit up.

result.eng: The child's face lit up with joy.

result.ga: Las an solas le do thoil

result.html: Las an solas le do thoilTurn the light on, please.

result.ga: Las an tine le do thoil

result.eng: He lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.

result.eng: She flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.
